title: Sarah Furay Let Off Drug Charges Due to DEA Father?
subtitle: Poor reporting and a sensationalized title led some to believe that "adorable drug kingpin" Sarah Furay was let off scot-free due to her father's connections with the Drug Enforcement Agency.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: "Adorable Drug Kingpin" Sarah Furay avoided charges due to her father's connection to the DEA.
